list.name: Default
list.comment: Removed tables LABEL, SETTINGS, DEFAULTS, WHSE, ITEM and TYPE from onUpgrade method.

task.summary: Default task
Version 1 - made changes to ChargeActivity - just cleaning things up.
Version 1 - made changes to ChargeActivity - just cleaning things up. Added some static imports.
Version 1 - added TODO to ChargeActivity and SettingsActivity to encrypt/decrypt password.
Version 1 - added TODO to ChargeActivity and SettingsActivity to encrypt/decrypt password.

Version 1 - Changed order of fields in ChrgTable.
Version 1 - Removed double quotes from upload file and changed extension to .txt. Corrected issue with not saving chrgData to db. Corrected order or fields in chrgData table.
Version 1 - Found issue with not being able to delete labels from ConfigActivity. Made changes to DatabaseHandler and ConfigActivity to correct this issue.
Version 1 - Found issue with not being able to delete labels from ConfigActivity. Made changes to DatabaseHandler and ConfigActivity to correct this issue.
Version 1 - Removed some commented methods, changed activity titles. Added scrollView to SettingsActivity and added 2 new fields, Host and HostPort.
Version 1 - Removed some commented methods, changed activity titles. Added scrollView to SettingsActivity and added 2 new fields, Host and HostPort.

Version 1 -Added Receive PO button to main activity.
Version 1 - Changed package name. Changed color of buttons.
Version 1 - Changed package name. Changed color of buttons.
Version 1 -added inputType to quantity and UPC fields.
Version 1 -Created Activity Layouts for TransferActivity, UploadActivity, ReceiveActivity. Added label "* Required" to those 3 activities as well as the ChargeActivity.
Version 1 - Adding buttons to new activities and started coding UploadActivity. Will complete UploadActivity and then work on TransferActivity.
Version 1 - Changed name of MainActivity to HomeActivity and added new LoginActivity.

Version 1 - Added classes UserFunctions and JSONParser for use with LoginActivity. Added LoginActivity and made it launcher activity. Modified AndroidManifest to reflect the change. Modified DatabaseHandler, added methods to deal with LoginActivity.
Version 1 - Added helper class which needs work. - modified uploadActivity, added send() and required methods - cleaned up some warnings, starting with DatabaseHandler
Added moveToFirst and moveToLast methods to traverse db in ChargeParts.

Completed the moveToFirst, moveToLast, moveToNext and moveToPrevious methods. moveToNext and moveToPrevious methods will pop a toast message when on first or last record stating that we are either on the first or the last record.
removed TODOs

Added TODOs for deleting records from DB and to edit existing records in db. Issue is that when attempting to db.update(), a new record is being created instead of editing the existing record. When attempting to delete 1 record, all records are removed.
Changes to deleteOne and deleteAll methods. Added del and delAll buttons. Some other small changes to clean up code.
Clear fields after send. Removed parameter "save" from saveToDB().
- Corrected some warnings in DatabaseHandler. - Removed save param from saveToDB(). - Completed update existing record. - Completed delete one record and delete all records.
- Changed deleteAll method to call purgeChrgData.
- Created clearFields method.
removed clearFields method as was not functioning as expected.
cleaning up some warnings.
cleaning up some warnings. commented out some unused methods.
changed some variable names for consistency.
removed a completed TODO
corrected a couple of warnings related to possible NPE
removed some old commented code.

Added populateFields method for other screens. Added switchDB method. Changed moveTo.. methods to accept an additional parameter which is the DB number for use with the switchDB method. Cleared up some warnings and changed TODOs.
Changed moveTo.. methods and purgeData method to send additional arguments.
Completed coding the buttons. Added setter methods, setUPC, setWHSE and setQty. Cleared some warnings.
edited call to exportDb to include table number
added delBtn and delAll buttons.

Changed DB to version 13 Added CREATE_UPLOAD_TABLE and required columns Changed saveToDb for upload activity to be able to update existing records Added conditions to exportDb to handle the different tables.
Completed UploadActivity
Changed filename extension to _upload, as per specs.
Added string definitions for filenames.
Added clearFields() to saveBtn and sendBtn.
Created deleteOne and deleteAll methods.
changed setSpinner methods to correct an issue with an unchecked cast warning and an unchecked call to getPosition(T).

Corrected position of delete and deleteAll buttons.
Corrected issue with setSpinnerItem and setSpinnerType methods.

Added fields and button listeners. Added TODOs for buttons
Started working on this activity. Added scanBtn code.
Completed field declarations. Completed scan button.

Corrected issue where first row of csv file was the column names.

Added del and delAll buttons.

COrrected issue with the moveToFirst, Last, etc.. as well as the deleteOne and deleteAll methods.

Added field validation for required fields. Defaulted Qty field to "1".

Changed "==" to "equals()"
Added comment to add method to check contents on tables and change button color if not empty.
Added field validation for required fields. Default Qty field to "1".
Added field validation for required fields. Default Qty field to "1".
Added checkTables routine, still a wip, to check if data exists in the tables. See comment in HomeActivity.

Back button drawable.

Commented out some debug code.

Added back button.
Added clearBottomFields() method. Modified saveMsg() so it does not pop if trying to send existing data without having saved any new records. Defaulted the Qty field to "1".
Added clearBottomFields() method. Modified saveMsg() so it does not pop if trying to send existing data without having saved any new records. Defaulted the Qty field to "1".
Added clearBottomFields() method. Modified saveMsg() so it does not pop if trying to send existing data without having saved any new records. Defaulted the Qty field to "1".

Changed scanField to numeric.
Changed scanField to numeric.
removed some debug code.
Converted field "msg" to local variable in validateFields().
Added clearVars() method to correct issue with last record being cached.
Added execSQL("vacuum") to clear up memory when deleting all records from a table.
Added _serial to clearVars()
Added clearVars() to resolve issue with the delete/deleteAll methods seemingly not removing the last record.
Added 2 new messages for sending test emails.
Added button to SettingsActivity to send a test message.
Added a couple new icons and a new button drawable.
Added email host and port. Previously these were hardcoded to use gmail. Can now be set to any valid SMTP server. Also changed screen title.
Removed a TODO and changed screen title.
Changed screen title
Changed screen title
Changed minimum SDK version to 14, which makes Android 4.0 the lowest supported version.
Made field save a local variable. Inlined field _label into setLabel().
Changed targetSdkVersion to 21
Removed var context from saveToDb() methods. This affects ChargeActivity, UploadActivity, ReceivePOActivity, TransferActivity and SettingsActivity. Added more JavaDoc comments.
Removed context from saveToDb() methods. Added more JavaDoc comments.
Locked all activities to portrait.
Corrected issue with moveToPrevious() not populating the upc and comment fields.
Corrected issue with UPC field sometimes stating that its invalid. Also changed _scanField and _commentField to EditText - not sure why they were textViews.
Removed unnecessary import.
Corrected issue with moveToNext() not populating the UPC field. Turned out the index was occasionally too high and would throw an exception. same issue as with the moveToNext() but the opposite.
Changed the way sendTestEmail() gets the account information.
Corrected issue with sending test email. Was getting an authentication failure.
removed goodbye message.
Corrected crash when scanning UPC due to NPE.
Quantity field was not numeric. Corrected this.
Added _po to clearVars()
Added _po to clearVars()
Moved call to db.purgeData() as it was outside the exception and causing the table to be purged even when the email failed to send.
Changed logic for onBackPressed(). No longer prompts the user if there is data waiting to be sent. Updated version.
Removed unnecessary variables sent and exit.
Too many to list. Ability to scan serial numbers add clear button mark fields required in settings activity Scan all types of bar codes added OnClickListener to serial and upc TextView
Changed button layout. Changes to do with button layout changes. Changed colors.
Changed button layout for other activities as well as accompanying code. Added new background.
Added ScanActivity to replace CaptureActivity. Now using ScanditSDK rather than ZXing. Completed changes in ChargeActivity to get scanning working with new SDK.
Added ScanActivity, ScanditSDK and required resource files.
Fixed ModuleBtnClrChngr(). Buttons now default to disabled until data is added.
Hardcoding login info for testing.
Added large layout for HomeActivity for 10.1" tablets.
Adjusted spacing
Added HelpActivity to load PDF.
Completed ScanActivity and added to remaining modules.
Added some res files. Removed FlashLight.java Updated version in Manifest.

Changed from using SDK for scanning to using the pic2shop free method. Added classes Scan and Utils for use with new scanning method. Updated Charge, Receive, Transfer and Upload activities to use new scanning method. Updated HomeActivity to check if pic2shop is installed and if not, go install it.
Removed tables LABEL, SETTINGS, DEFAULTS, WHSE, ITEM and TYPE from onUpgrade method.
Fixed NPE in UploadActivity when saving.
